"A.D.2028/4/20/12:00": "Hmmm... it seems something different is beginning to appear, Mother."
"Those of Earth Guide seemed to name them \"ESC-A Darkers\"?"
"That name is correct, more or less. If there's any difference, it's that these new Phantoms are under my control."
"Hoho. You have them under control. Then, it was your will that they commit destructive behavior?"
"...I'm not used to it."
"Used to what?"
"The fusion of Ether and Photons... I have obviously taken Aru into my body. However, my body still isn't used to it."
"Because of that, though they came from my will, a part of them are not under my control."
"And the reason you haven't gotten used to it?"
"Most likely the connection with <%me>, as well as Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Indeed. As long as this connection remains, Aru will continue to exist inside me. He will likely never be absorbed completely."
"It's a very strong connection. However, this connection was the miracle that allowed Aru to be born in the first place."
"In order to break the connection... All we can do is kill those who are connected."
"...Kill? Mother, you're going to... kill Hitsugi?"
"Yes, Kohri Washinomiya. That's the only way to save Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Her brainwashing is rooted deep inside her brain. Even through surgery, I couldn't do anything."
"That's why, as Mother said, all we can do is kill her, reset her, and then resurrect her. You understand right, Kohri Washinomiya?"
"If we do that, she'll return? Hitsugi will return to normal?"
"We can return to those days, right? Going to school together, talking about clothes, the student council, our idle conversations... "
"We can go back to school, to our ordinary daily lives... right?"
"Of course."
"Something is wrong."
"Are you referring to Kohri Washinomiya, old man? If we look at her goals and desires, it can't be helped that she's unhinged."
"Kohri Washinomiya's instability is obvious, but... Something is off about Mother, as well."
"Mother has a desire for revenge and hostility against the so called \"Photoners\" who reside in PSO2. That, I know."
"However, to those of us from Earth, she's treated us with nothing but kindness and compassion."
"But recently... Attacks on Earth Guide have become more severe. And now... she even said to kill Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Some sacrifices must be made for the greater good. We've made many sacrifices for the good of Mother Cluster."
"For Mother, I think those were difficult decisions... There doesn't seem to be anything strange to me."
"Speaking of strange, you are too, Ophiel."
"Why did you kill Bethor?"
"...Those were Mother's orders."
"That's not true, is it? If that were the case, why did she leave Hagith alone? That was your own judgement..."
"Why doesn't Mother ever question you? Because of that, I'll ask you myself."
"Ophiel Herbert. Why did you kill Bethor, faking an order from Mother?"
"What do you see beyond the path you walk with Mother?"
"Old man... What do you think about the current situation on Earth?"
"To respond to a question with a question... You're acting more and more strange."
"Humanity has declined. In terms of genetics, technology, mental capabilities... to the point where we're almost devolving."
"Then Ether and Mother appeared, old man."
"A making of humanity. For humanity's sake, I couldn't care less how dirty these hands become."
"Everything we do is for the future of our planet. That means sacrifices must sometimes be made. Now, and in the future..."
"The future of the planet... Ophiel, you may have been better off as a philosopher than a doctor."
